name: Payment Gateway Groups for WooCommerce
author: Ivan Chernyakov

sections.description:
Payment Gateway Groups for WooCommerce allows you to create groups from your list of available payment gateways. Tested with popular themes. There is a normal mod and toggle. You can also change the active color.

Useful if you have a large number of payment gateways.

Pro Version
* Drag and Drop
* Infinite Groups
* Subgroups
* Image titles

!Warning Plugin uses WooCommerce page templates (“checkout/payment.php” and “checkout/payment-method.php”). If there are similar files in your “theme-name/woocommerce” folder, then they will not work.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WooCommerce 3.5.3 or greater
  1. Upload the entire plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to “WooCoommerce” -> “Settings” -> “Payment Gateway Groups”.
sections.faq:
How to delete existing groups?

Just leave empty the field blank.
sections.changelog:
1.1.3 – 2022-04-16

  • Tweak: Tested with WordPress 5.9
  • Tweak: Updated Freemius to version 2.4.3

1.1.2 – 2020-12-31

  • Tweak: Tested with WordPress 5.6

1.1.1 – 2019-09-12

  • Tweak: Added new display mode – toggle (manual collapse/expand).
  • Fix: The starting active group tab was minimized and expanded when you first click on it.
  • Fix: Allowed to select all gateways, instead of only enabled ones.

1.1.0 – 2019-09-06

  • New: Freemius integration.
  • Tweak: Changed file structure.

1.0.1 – 2019-09-03

  • Fix: The last group is not displayed.

1.0.0 – 2019-07-13

  • Release.

short_description: Allows you to create groups for payment gateways on the checkout page.
